Name: consumer_personal_information_helper
clcommon__Content__c:
Why do you need this information?
We use your personal information to verify your identity and access your credit history. We take protecting your personal information very seriously and do not share your information for any purposes beyond credit, identity, income, and fraud verification.
How is this information used?
We use your personal information to access and verify your credit history, to verify your identity and run applicable background checks and to verify your income (if applicable ) . To learn more about the ways we use your personal information, click here to view our Privacy Policy.
